extendedInfo.description: Total unit convert are most powerful and fully featured Unit converter, Currency converter. It's intuitive and easy to use. Features fast, real time  Currency and unit conversion in a clean and user-friendly  interface. The easiest to use unit converter on the market. Features:  *  Currency conversions      - World currencies (40+), live exchange rates.  *  Universal Unit converter     - Real-time conversion     - It provides a fast, reliable and comfortable tool         to convert values into different categories such as         Mass/Weight, Length, Temperature, Area , Pressure,        Speed, Power, Energy, Fuel Consumption, Force,         Bits/Bytes, volume ,time, Density and Speed.     - It Convert 15+ conversions NOTE: **Please leave your comments for Total Converter on market.   It will encourage the developer to continue his effort. **If  you have any questions or issues, send an email at    the address given below. To request additional units,   please send an email instead of writing a comment.   lakkojulokesh@gmail.com
